appinfo_list.name: Developer
appinfo_list.value: The Football Association Premier League Ltd

app_descript:
Premier League

Brief: The official Premier League app offers comprehensive management for your Fantasy Premier League team, coupled with live matchday updates, extensive fixtures, results, and tables from various competitions including the PL2, U18, and Champions League. Discover video highlights of leading players, read the latest club news, delve into detailed statistics, and explore in-depth profiles of both players and clubs throughout the Premier League's illustrious history.
